description: Lightweight and easy-moving, the Men's Arch Rock 9" Short were built for warm-weather hiking, but you’ll find they happily creep into just about any kind of activity. Its stretch performance fabric works for everything from climbing to camping, and UPF 50 keeps you protected on days you just feel like playing catch or throwing old tennis balls to your pup.
name: Marmot Arch Rock Shorts, 9`` Inseam - Mens
